segments.text: There's a boy standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching as high as he can to grab those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement on his face as he grabs another cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, waiting for him to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she's waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mom knows they're sneaking cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems so determined, balancing precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, just waiting for her brother to pass her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
